hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Set the below parameters manually package_name="statsd" published_version="0.8.0"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi #----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- export work_dir=`pwd`
sudo zypper up -y sudo zypper install -y git wget unzip java-1_8_0-openjdk-devel make gcc-c++ netcat-openbsd
#Install Nodejs wget http://public.dhe.ibm.com/ibmdl/export/pub/systems/cloud/runtimes/nodejs/6.12.2.0/linux/s390x/ibm-6.12.2.0-node-v6.12.2-linux-s390x.bin chmod +x ibm-6.12.2.0-node-v6.12.2-linux-s390x.bin echo -e "LICENSE_ACCEPTED=TRUE\nUSER_INSTALL_DIR=$work_dir/ibm/node\n-fileOverwrite_$work_dir/ibm/node/_node_installation/uninstall.lax=Yes" > installer.properties cat installer.properties ./ibm-6.12.2.0-node-v6.12.2-linux-s390x.bin -f installer.properties -i silent export PATH=$PATH:$work_dir/ibm/node/bin node -v
#Download Statsd source code cd $work_dir git clone https://github.com/etsy/statsd.git cd statsd git checkout v0.8.0
#Build Statsd npm install
#Run test cases cd $work_dir/statsd/ ./run_tests.sh
#Run Statsd daemon cd $work_dir/statsd/ node stats.js $work_dir/statsd/exampleConfig.js & sleep 10s echo "foo:1|c" | nc -u -w2 127.0.0.1 8125 pgrep statsd pkill statsd
